public.attachments.name: attachments

columns.name: original_name
columns.comment: Оригинальное имя файла

columns.name: storage_path
columns.comment: Путь к файлу в Supabase Storage

columns.name: size_bytes
columns.comment: Размер файла в байтах

columns.name: mime_type
columns.comment: MIME тип файла

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: Пользователь, загрузивший файл

public.contractor_types.name: contractor_types
public.contractor_types.comment: Reference of contractor categories used across contractor records.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Surrogate primary key for contractor type.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Unique short code of contractor type used in integrations.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Human readable contractor type name.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional description that clarifies how the contractor type is used.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp of when the contractor type record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp automatically refreshed by trigger update_updated_at_column().

public.contractors.name: contractors
public.contractors.comment: Registry of contractors linked to invoices and projects.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Surrogate primary key for contractor.

columns.name: type_id
columns.comment: Foreign key to public.contractor_types.id indicating contractor category.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Official contractor name stored for invoicing.

columns.name: inn
columns.comment: Russian tax identifier (INN) of the contractor.

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: Identifier of the Supabase auth user that created the contractor.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the contractor record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp automatically refreshed by trigger update_updated_at_column().

public.invoice_attachments.name: invoice_attachments
public.invoice_attachments.comment: Связь между счетами и прикрепленными файлами
public.invoice_attachments.sql:
-- Связь между счетами и прикрепленными файлами
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.invoice_attachments (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    invoice_id uuid NOT NULL,
    attachment_id uuid NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT invoice_attachments_attachment_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attachment_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT invoice_attachments_invoice_id_attachment_id_key UNIQUE (attachment_id),
    CONSTRAINT invoice_attachments_invoice_id_attachment_id_key UNIQUE (invoice_id),
    CONSTRAINT invoice_attachments_invoice_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (invoice_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT invoice_attachments_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE public.invoice_attachments IS 'Связь между счетами и прикрепленными файлами';

public.invoice_statuses.name: invoice_statuses
public.invoice_statuses.comment: Reference of invoice workflow statuses used throughout PayHub.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Surrogate primary key for invoice status.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Unique code used to reference the status in APIs and UI.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Human readable status label.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional description explaining when to use the status.

columns.name: sort_order
columns.comment: Ordering weight for displaying statuses.

columns.name: color
columns.comment: Optional color token or hex value for UI badges.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the invoice status was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp automatically refreshed by trigger update_updated_at_column().

public.invoice_types.name: invoice_types
public.invoice_types.comment: Reference of invoice classification types (e.g. services, materials).

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Surrogate primary key for invoice type.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Unique code representing the invoice type.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Human readable invoice type name.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional description of what the invoice type represents.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the invoice type record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp automatically refreshed by trigger update_updated_at_column().

public.invoices.name: invoices

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key and external identifier of the invoice.

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: Supabase auth user who owns or issued the invoice.

columns.name: invoice_number
columns.comment: Human readable invoice number visible to customers.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional invoice description or customer facing note.

columns.name: due_date
columns.comment: Date by which payment is expected.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the invoice was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp automatically refreshed by trigger update_updated_at_column().

columns.name: invoice_date
columns.comment: Calendar date printed on the invoice.

columns.name: payer_id
columns.comment: Contractor (public.contractors.id) acting as payer.

columns.name: supplier_id
columns.comment: Contractor (public.contractors.id) acting as supplier.

columns.name: project_id
columns.comment: Associated project (public.projects.id).

columns.name: invoice_type_id
columns.comment: Invoice type reference (public.invoice_types.id).

columns.name: amount_with_vat
columns.comment: Invoice total amount including VAT.

columns.name: vat_rate
columns.comment: VAT rate applied to the invoice amount (percent).

columns.name: vat_amount
columns.comment: VAT portion of the invoice total.

columns.name: amount_without_vat
columns.comment: Invoice total amount excluding VAT.

columns.name: delivery_days
columns.comment: Number of days for delivery after payment.

columns.name: delivery_days_type
columns.comment: Delivery day interpretation: working or calendar.

columns.name: preliminary_delivery_date
columns.comment: Projected delivery date calculated from payment terms.

columns.name: status_id
columns.comment: Invoice workflow status (public.invoice_statuses.id).

public.projects.name: projects
public.projects.comment: Projects that group invoices and contractors for reporting.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Surrogate primary key for project.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Optional unique project code for integrations and search.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Project display name.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional project description for internal users.

columns.name: is_active
columns.comment: Flag that marks whether the project is active.

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: Supabase auth user who created the project.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the project record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp automatically refreshed by trigger update_updated_at_column().

public.roles.name: roles
public.roles.comment: Roles that define access levels inside PayHub.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key for role.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Unique machine readable code of the role.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Human readable role name.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional description of permissions or intended usage.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the role was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp automatically refreshed by trigger update_updated_at_column().

public.user_profiles.name: user_profiles
public.user_profiles.comment: Mirror of Supabase auth user profiles stored in public schema.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key and foreign key to auth.users.id.

columns.name: email
columns.comment: Primary email address associated with the user profile.

columns.name: full_name
columns.comment: Display name of the user shown in UI.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the profile was recorded.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp automatically refreshed by trigger update_updated_at_column().

public.user_projects.name: user_projects
public.user_projects.comment: Mapping table assigning users to projects for access control.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Surrogate primary key for user-project relation.

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: Supabase auth user granted access to the project.

columns.name: project_id
columns.comment: Project (public.projects.id) assigned to the user.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the user-project link was created.
